subject: British Open (Golf)
Golf
Housing and Real Estate
lead_paragraph: As hotels and bed and breakfasts in St. Andrews declare no more vacancies, the remaining options fall to vacation apartment rentals from real estate agencies, Web sites and homemade signs in windows.
snippet: As hotels and bed and breakfasts in St. Andrews declare no more vacancies, the remaining options fall to vacation apartment rentals from real estate agencies, Web sites and homemade signs in windows.
